modes.title: Growing
modes.description: Ready to build? Small wins that add up.

activities.title: Learn for 15 Minutes
activities.explain: Pick something you want to know more about. Read, watch, or listen for 15 minutes.

activities.title: Practice a Skill
activities.explain: Choose one skill you're building. Practice for 15 minutes with focus.

activities.title: Take One Step Toward a Goal
activities.explain: Think of a goal you've been putting off. Do one small thing toward it right now.

activities.title: Mindful Tea or Coffee
activities.explain: Make a warm drink. Sit with it. Sip slowly. Notice the warmth, taste, and smell.

activities.title: Full Body Scan
activities.explain: Sit or lie down. Notice your head, then shoulders, chest, belly, legs. Just notice.

activities.title: Write 3 Gratitudes
activities.explain: Write down three things you're grateful for today. They can be small.

activities.title: 5-Minute Walk Outside
activities.explain: Put on shoes. Step outside. Walk for 5 minutes. Let the air wake you up.

activities.title: One Energizing Song
activities.explain: Pick a song that makes you feel something. Press play. Listen to the whole thing.

activities.title: Text a Friend
activities.explain: Think of someone you like. Send them a simple hello. No need for a long chat.

modes.title: Surviving
modes.description: Hard day? Here's the simplest stuff.

activities.title: 4-7-8 Breathing
activities.explain: Breathe in for 4 seconds. Hold for 7. Breathe out for 8. Do it 3 times.

activities.title: Cold Water on Face
activities.explain: Go to a sink. Splash cold water on your face 3 times. Pat dry.

activities.title: Feet on Ground
activities.explain: Press both feet into the floor. Feel the solid ground. Hold for 10 seconds.
